item.description:
Hi Energy fans, do you like to talk "Energy" well come enjoy a get together every third Thursday of the month in Portsmouth for "Green Drinks" it is essential people coming together to talk about energy, sustainability, back to nature, etc. There are speakers monthly.

We have a great guest speaker from Seacoast Local. Come hear about their network of locally-owned and independent businesses as well as their awesome speaker series at the River Run Bookstore. This should be a fun night! If it's your first time, this is a free-form social event for green-minded folks.

Hope to see everyone on Thursday.

Peter
item.how_to_find_us: Ex: I'll be the guy in the back with a Meetup t-shirt
item.name: Portsmouth Green Drinks
